data.name: Dono's Tale
data.detailed_description:
A BLAST FROM THE PAST


Relive the glory days of the 16 and 32-bit era in Dono's Tale. A super cute and colorful platformer about a hungry little dragon! Jump, dash, climb, and shoot your way through detailed and colorful worlds in order to get back your precious fruit!.

MEET DONO!




Our little blue hero is ready to set out on his very first adventure to get back his stolen fruit!
you will have to help Dono find his way through Grasslands, deserts, ancient underwater cities,
mountains, and even outer space!

you will have to avoid enemies and solve puzzling obstacles, but don't worry Dono has a variety of abilities he will learn throughout his adventure. Fireballs, Dragon claw, ThunderStrike, Power Mittens, and Pegasus Wings are some of the abilities Dono will be able to perform in order to defeat bosses and recover his stolen fruit!

ABILITIES!


Dono has a wide variety of abilities! with them you will platform your way to get back that fruit!


PEGASUS WING





with the pegasus wing, Dono can leap very high when on the ground and flutter while in the air for extra air time!

ThunderStrike





The ThunderStrike lets Dono dash and slides under small gaps!

POWER MITTENS





The Power mittens let Dono grab walls and enemies!


the abilities can be swapped on the fly. so if you are fast enough you can chain abilities together!





these are only some of the abilities you will be able to master in Dono's Tale!

so get ready to discover what more awaits in this fantastic adventure!

data.short_description: Relive the glory days of the 16 and 32-bit era in Dono's Tale. A super cute and colorful platformer about a hungry little dragon! Jump, dash, climb, and shoot your way through detailed and colorful worlds in order to get back your precious fruit!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
